name: Ealam Arib
storyline:
The story of this world is about the time when the city of Areeb invented the robots that they called "Al-Sanad".

"Al-Sanad" worked for people in all fields and areas from domestic work to military work until many of the city's residents gave up learning because there was no need for it.

Years passed, and ignorance spread among many. Some neighboring cities hated those "Al-Sanad" machines, and the relations of other cities with the city of Areeb deteriorated.

On a dark day, all the "Al-Sanad" machines in the city broke down, and the city's database was hacked and then erased, and the city lost its most precious thing.

Moreover, at the same time, machines similar to "Al-Sanad" attacked the city of Areeb.

The city of Areeb was able to repel the attack because it had prepared a cavalry unit whose mission was to defend the city of Areeb from any external attack.

The situation of the city of Areeb is now very miserable. The city began to regain its vitality little by little, and decided not to repeat its mistake again.
summary:
Areeb World is an online multiplayer MMORPG. Join your friends in a world full of excitement and mystery and help Areeb's world rise again!

An interactive, multiplayer game with loads of fun and learning, Areeb World intelligently integrates the sciences and mathematics straight from students’ curricula into a virtual gaming experience of tasks and tactics. With facts and answers needed to overcome obstacles and challenges, the love for knowledge is strongly stimulated within the minds of these young players.
